name: Pizza Rat Goes On A Date With Cigarette Crab
name_original: Pizza Rat Goes On A Date With Cigarette Crab
description: Remember those brief shining moments in late 2015 when we all got excited because a rat in New York City stole a whole piece of pizza, and a crab in Philly went walking around with a cigarette? This game immortalizes that by having them go on a date.
